{{title|1=operator==&lt;small&gt;(std::filesystem::file_status)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/filesystem/file_status/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++20 | 1=
friend bool operator==( const file_status&amp; lhs, const file_status&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks if two {{tt|file_status}} values are equal, i.e. types and permissions represented by them are same respectively.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::filesystem::file_status}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | lhs, rhs | {{tt|file_status}} values to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|1=lhs.type() == rhs.type() &amp;&amp; lhs.permissions() == rhs.permissions()}}
